boofcv.alg.feature.detect.template
Class TemplateMatching<T extends ImageBase>

java.lang.Object
  boofcv.alg.feature.detect.template.TemplateMatching<T>

public class TemplateMatching<T extends ImageBase>
extends java.lang.Object

Runs a template matching algorithm across the image. Local peaks are found in the resulting intensity image and the best solutions returned.

Author:
Peter Abeles

Constructor Summary

          Specifies internal algorithm

Constructor Detail

TemplateMatching

public TemplateMatching(TemplateMatchingIntensity<T> match)
Specifies internal algorithm

Parameters:
match - Provide template matching intensity algorithm
Method Detail

setMinimumSeparation

public void setMinimumSeparation(int radius)
Adjust how close to objects can be found to each other

Parameters:
radius - Distance in pixels. Try using the template's radius or 2

setTemplate

public void setTemplate(T template,
                        int maxMatches)
Specifies the template to search for and the maximum number of matches to return.

Parameters:
template - Template being searched for
maxMatches - The maximum number of matches it will return

process

public void process(T image)
Performs template matching.

Parameters:
image - Image being processed

getResults

public FastQueue<Match> getResults()
Returns all the found matches. The location is the location of the top left corner of the template. Score is the first score with higher number being better

Returns:
List of found templates
